body: I wish i could read/speak Japanese at times like these.
Is it really rape if she enjoys it?

I tried translate but...  You need feel it.
The protagonist is Toyoko, an inter fering middle scholler who has super popular air-headed big sister(unnamed).
She have protected her siseter thanks to cooperating with a unpaid bolunteer Kurahashi, her big sister's high school teacher.
But Kurahashi loves Toyoko,  he gives her an excuse that "I love your big sister, but you won't that. So you should be instead of her." and rapes her.

Toyoko is the little sister who only care about her big sister, but she has a man who cares about Toyoko. So, this story goes Happy-ending ? 
No,  Toyoko's identity is too closely related to her sister.
She judges Kurahashi that "I'm better than my sister? You has no eye for women", and reject him.

Ichihaya mentioned about that relationship is only works betweeen sisters in the afterwords.
Can we all just agree that Ichihaya is one of the best loli loving artists out there. How I wish I knew how to read Japanese.
Ichihaya back with a neat character design. can't wait for the translation.
*Just looking on everyday Lolicon doujinshi*....... "[Ichihaya]"........... YEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!
nice one，ありがとうございました
Ichihaya going back to basics it seems with a simple rape story, I ain’t complaining.
